project_dimension_tags.semanticTest: I am working on the {project} project. I am trying to do build/work with {HowToTopic} to create a {HowToTask}. My experience level is {audience}. I am working with the BIRT source and the source project is {source_project}. I have a question about the BIRT Report Object Model element {rom_element}. This web page is very {quality}. I am using the following {project} api {api}.

dimension.name: how_to_topic
dimension.description: The HowToTopic is used to provide a very simple categorization of the top level activities in BIRT

tag.name: BirtInstall
tag.description: I am trying to install BIRT

tag.name: ReportDesign
tag.description: I am trying to create a report with the BIRT report designer

tag.name: ChartDesign
tag.description: I am trying to build charts with the BIRT report designer

tag.name: Data
tag.description: I am working on getting data into my report design

tag.name: ReportOutput
tag.description: I am trying to create or modify the output of the report

tag.name: BasicDeploy
tag.description: I am following the simplest BIRT deployment model, the BIRT Web Viewer

tag.name: ChartIntegration
tag.description: I want to include stand-alone charts in my application

tag.name: DeployIntegration
tag.description: I want to integrate running and viewing reports into my application without the Web Viewer

tag.name: Extension
tag.description: Questions and discussion about extension of BIRT

tag.name: GettingInvolved
tag.description: Discussions of new projects, code contributions, and how to get involved.

tag.name: BirtBusiness
tag.description: Questions about project goals, direction, management, etc.

dimension.name: how_to_task
dimension.description: This tag identifies a specific task within a broad HowToTopic area

tag.name: question
tag.description: A question with no answer.

tag.name: hint
tag.description: Doesn't really answer the question but points to some possible answers

tag.name: definitive
tag.description: Provides a correct and appropriate answer

tag.name: misleading
tag.description: Answer provides either incorrect or inappropriate

tag.name: All
tag.description: Applicable to anyone using BIRT

tag.name: GettingStarted
tag.description: New to BIRT

tag.name: User
tag.description: Report Development and Web Viewer Deployment schemes

tag.name: Integrator
tag.description: Someone using BIRT within their product

tag.name: Committer
tag.description: Some working on contributing to the core BIRT source code

tag.name: scriptApi
tag.description: BIRT Report Scripting API Reference

tag.name: modelApi
tag.description: Report Object Model API Reference

tag.name: engineApi
tag.description: Report Engine API Reference

tag.name: oda202Api
tag.description: Open Data Access (ODA) 2.0.2 API Reference

tag.name: oda300
tag.description: Open Data Access (ODA) 3.0.0 API Reference

tag.name: dataEngineApi
tag.description: Data Engine API Reference

tag.name: chartEngineApi
tag.description: Chart Engine API Reference

tag.name: chartUiApi
tag.description: Chart User Interface API Reference
